medium: Cotton, mercerized cotton; supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's ceremonial blouse (Huipil)
description: three paneled cotton huipil woven on a back strap loom; two side white panels; one central black panel brocaded with geometric designs including birds and corn plants in purple, blue, red and green; two white side panels (God\'s eye symbol designs); brocade in the side panels is alternated by multi-lined white texture
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
